verses.verse: When <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H7578>trembling,<s%> he <S%H5375>exalted<s%> <S%H1931>himself<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> but when he <S%H816>offended<s%> in <S%H1168>Baal,<s%> he <S%H4191>died.<s%>

And <S%H6258>now<s%> they <S%H2398>sin<s%> more and more, and have <S%H6213>made<s%> them <S%H4541>molten<s%> images of their <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and <S%H6091>idols<s%> according to their own <S%H8394>understanding,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> of it the <S%H4639>work<s%> of the <S%H2796>craftsmen:<s%> they <S%H559>say<s%> of them, Let the <S%H120>men<s%> that <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> <S%H5401>kiss<s%> the <S%H5697>calves.<s%>

<S%H3651>Therefore<s%> they shall be as the <S%H1242>morning<s%> cloud <S%H6051><s%>and as the <S%H7925>early<s%> <S%H2919>dew<s%> that <S%H1980>passes<s%> away, as the <S%H4671>chaff<s%> that is <S%H5590>driven<s%> with the <S%H5590>whirlwind<s%> out of the <S%H1637>floor,<s%> and as the <S%H6227>smoke<s%> out of the <S%H699>chimney.<s%>

Yet I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> from the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H430>god<s%> but me: for there is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H3467>savior<s%> <S%H1115>beside<s%> me.
I did <S%H3045>know<s%> you in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H8514>great<s%> <S%H8514>drought.<s%>

According to their <S%H4830>pasture,<s%> so were they <S%H7646>filled;<s%> they were <S%H7646>filled,<s%> and their <S%H3820>heart<s%> was <S%H7311>exalted;<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> have they <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> me.
Therefore I will be to them as a <S%H7826>lion:<s%> as a <S%H5246>leopard<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> will I <S%H7789>observe<s%> them:

I will <S%H6298>meet<s%> them as a <S%H1677>bear<s%> that is <S%H7909>bereaved<s%> of her whelps, and will <S%H7167>rend<s%> the <S%H5458>lobe<s%> of their <S%H3820>heart,<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> will I <S%H398>devour<s%> them like a <S%H3833>lion:<s%> the <S%H7704>wild<s%> <S%H2416>beast<s%> shall <S%H1234>tear<s%> them.
O <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> you have <S%H7843>destroyed<s%> yourself; but in me is your <S%H5828>help.<s%>

I <S%H165>will<s%> be your <S%H4428>king:<s%> <S%H645>where<s%> is any other that may <S%H3467>save<s%> you in <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H5892>cities?<s%> and your <S%H8199>judges<s%> of <S%H834>whom<s%> you <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H5414>Give<s%> me a <S%H4428>king<s%> and <S%H8269>princes?<s%>
I <S%H5414>gave<s%> you a <S%H4428>king<s%> in my <S%H639>anger,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> him away in my <S%H5678>wrath.<s%>
The <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> is <S%H6887>bound<s%> up; his <S%H2403>sin<s%> is <S%H6845>hid.<s%>

The <S%H2256>sorrows<s%> of a <S%H3205>travailing<s%> woman shall <S%H935>come<s%> on him: he is an <S%H3808>unwise<s%> <S%H2450><s%> <S%H1121>son;<s%> for he should not <S%H5975>stay<s%> long in the place of the <S%H4866>breaking<s%> <S%H4866>forth<s%> of <S%H1121>children.<s%>

I will <S%H6299>ransom<s%> them from the <S%H3027>power<s%> of the <S%H7585>grave;<s%> I will <S%H1350>redeem<s%> them from <S%H4194>death:<s%> O <S%H4194>death,<s%> I <S%H165>will<s%> be your <S%H1698>plagues;<s%> O <S%H7585>grave,<s%> I <S%H165>will<s%> be your <S%H6987>destruction:<s%> <S%H5164>repentance<s%> shall be <S%H5641>hid<s%> from my <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>

<S%H3588>Though<s%> he be <S%H6500>fruitful<s%> <S%H996>among<s%> his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> an <S%H6921>east<s%> wind shall <S%H935>come,<s%> the <S%H7307>wind<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H5927>come<s%> up from the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> and his <S%H4726>spring<s%> shall become <S%H954>dry,<s%> and his <S%H4599>fountain<s%> shall be <S%H2717>dried<s%> up: he shall <S%H8154>spoil<s%> the <S%H214>treasure<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2532>pleasant<s%> <S%H3627>vessels.<s%>

<S%H8111>Samaria<s%> shall <S%H816>become<s%> <S%H816>desolate;<s%> for she has <S%H4784>rebelled<s%> against her <S%H430>God:<s%> they shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword:<s%> their <S%H5768>infants<s%> shall be <S%H7376>dashed<s%> in pieces, and their women with <S%H2030>child<s%> shall be <S%H1234>ripped<s%> up.
